mapper.select: select c1.id, c1.name, c2.id child_id, c2.name child_name, c2.icon child_icon from pms_product_category c1 left join pms_product_category c2 on c1.id = c2.parent_id where c1.parent_id = 0 and c1.nav_status = 1 and c1.show_status = 1
select c1.id, c1.name, c1.parent_id as parentId from pms_product_category c1 where c1.parent_id = 0 and c1.nav_status = 1 and c1.show_status = 1
select c1.* from pms_product_category c1 where c1.parent_id = #{id}

select pd.id, pd.name, pd.logo, pd.recommend from pms_product_category c1 inner join pms_product pp on pp.product_category_id = c1.id inner join pms_brand pd on pp.brand_id = pd.id where c1.id = #{categotyId}
